text: The 1961–62 FAW Welsh Cup is the 75th season of the annual knockout tournament for competitive football teams in Wales. ==Key== League name pointed after clubs name. *CCL - Cheshire County League *FL D2 - Football League Second Division *FL D3 - Football League Third Division *FL D4 - Football League Fourth Division *WLN - Welsh League North ==Fifth round== Ten winners from the Fourth round and six new clubs. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Chester (FL D4)||1–2||Holyhead Town (WLN) |} ==Sixth round== ==Semifinal== Bangor City and Cardiff City played at Wrexham, Wrexham and Swansea Town played at Cardiff. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |1||Bangor City (CCL)||2–0||Cardiff City (FL D1) |- |2||Wrexham (FL D4)||3–2||Swansea Town (FL D2) |} ==Final== Third match was played at Rhyl. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !width=50|Tie no !width=250|Home !width=50|Score !width=250|Away |- |rowspan=2|1||Wrexham (FL D4)||3–0||Bangor City (CCL) |- |Bangor City (CCL)||2–0||Wrexham (FL D4) |- |replay||Bangor City (CCL)||3–1||Wrexham (FL D4)'' |} ==External links== *The FAW Welsh Cup 1961-62 Wales Cup
title: 1961–62 Welsh Cup
